text: Well, hello there, Jada Kingdom Social media is buzzing over [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2566100/megan-thee-stallion-slams-pardi-pardison-fontaine/)â€˜s thicccc new gyalfriend [Jada Kingdom](https://bossip.com/2530048/jada-kingdom-pardi-megan-thee-stallion/) clapping her copious Caribbean cakes in a now-viral video that sent fans into a frenzy on New Yearâ€™s Day. Oh yes, sheâ€™s quite the generational TALENT who set off strong gusts of twerk wind across social media. â€” Rasheed Sunflower ãƒ„ (@AoCIzzy) [January 2, 2024] As [previously reported](https://bossip.com/2528507/megan-thee-stallion-accuses-pardison-fontaine-of-cheating/), the Jamaican baddie trended after being accused of slithering into [Megan Thee Stallion](https://bossip.com/2528386/fans-react-megan-thee-stallion-ex-pardison-fontaine-allegedly-cheating-new-single-cobra/)â€˜s bed with [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2528507/megan-thee-stallion-accuses-pardison-fontaine-of-cheating/). Megan spilled the tea in her latest single â€œCobraâ€ where she revealed that she went through a bad breakup caused by infidelity. The Hot Girl rapped, â€œPulled up, caught him cheating, getting his d**k sucked in the same spot Iâ€™m sleeping/ Lord, give me a break, I donâ€™t know how much more of this s**t I can take.â€ Naturally, fans assumed the lyrics were about her ex-boo [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2528386/fans-react-megan-thee-stallion-ex-pardison-fontaine-allegedly-cheating-new-single-cobra/) and his current girlfriend Jada Kingdom who posted a photo of flowers she received from Pardi coincidentally on the same day that â€œCobraâ€ dropped. It looks like Jada Kingdom received this beautiful floral arrangement from a special someone!! I see why Pardi cheated on Megan w/ this Jada Kingdom gal cus this is generational cheating materialâ€¦ [pic.twitter.com/3A5mORVbvN] â€” Van (@vanman_1000) [November 4, 2023] The Kingston native eventually [broke her silence](https://www.tmz.com/2023/11/03/megan-thee-stallion-cobra-lyrics-pardison-fontaine-jada-kingdom/(?adid=partner-bossip)) with some shade towards the Hotties and â€œtheir Presidentâ€ Megan Thee Stallion, â€œSooo I guess I knew the lyrics before it dropped? She continued, â€œDonâ€™t insert me in sh*t that got NOTHING to do with me, How did the math equal ME?! Plus dat sh*t dumb as f*ck!â€ As for her new man, her man, her man Pardison Fontaine, well, he continued to get dragged in his comment section on social media with one fan most recently writing, â€œGetting a â€œFEMINISTâ€ tattoo then cheating on a woman at her lowest point is WILD.â€ Do you think Jada Kingdom is the next big Jamaican artist?
